thread.title: Trinny Woodall propositions Phillip Schofield with sexual joke on This Morning and Holly Willoughby can't stop giggling
thread.title_full: Trinny Woodall propositions Phillip Schofield with sexual joke on This Morning and Holly Willoughby can't stop giggling

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Trinny Woodall propositions Phillip Schofield with sexual joke on This Morning and Holly Willoughby can't stop giggling
text:
Trinny Woodall propositions Phillip Schofield with sexual joke on This Morning and Holly Willoughby can't stop giggling Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Trinny makes Phillip a very sexual innuendo-y offer Share this video   
Things got a little saucy on This Morning when Trinny Woodall made a guest appearance as a style expert. 
As the former BBC star showed off transformations and gave tips on how to find the perfect jeans, she accidentally found herself propositioning Phillip Schofield. 
As the presenter complained about his own Jeans, he revealed that he'd been forced to change out of his original look for being "too casual". 
Trinny responded: "Let me come in your changing room one day..." Trinny didn't mean to make the remark (Photo: ITV) Holly began to giggle (Photo: ITV) 
A stunned Holly Willoughby and Phillip gasped before breaking out into a giggling fit. 
It didn't take Trinny long to catch on to what she had said, and soon enough she couldn't stop laughing while Phil and Holly tried to complete the segment. 
One viewer joked: "So @trinnywoodall wants to come in @Schofe's changing room on #thismorning" Read More Trinny was left red-faced (Photo: ITV) 
"Oh trinny #thismorning," added another viewer alongside a mass of laugh/cry emojis. 
As Phillip Scholfield and Holly Willoughby sat down to discuss the pitfalls of ill-fitting jeans, Trinny invited out some of the crew members to show off their new makeovers. (Photo: ITV) Read More BBC Breakfast's Louise Minchin won't be back until MONDAY after being taken ill live on air (Photo: ITV) 
A number of fans blasted the star - who's admitted to using botox in the past - for her "frozen" upper lip. 
One confused tweeter wrote: "Women should embrace who they are. Says Trinny with her puffy face pumped full of botox & fillers. #ThisMorning" 
#THISMORNING.TRINNY'S TOP LIP DOES NOT MOVE," added a second baffled viewer. Like us on Facebook
